author: Mike Memoli, Gary Grumbach, Marianna Sotomayor, Shaquille Brewster
title: Sanders drops out: How Biden, Sanders (and Obama) got to this point
description: President Obama spoke with both Biden and Sanders multiple times over the past month.
content:
Sanders drops out: How Biden, Sanders (and Obama) got to this point
